thread.title: Blake Lively: Instagram breastfeeding bikini photo reveals ‘perks’ | The
thread.title_full: Blake Lively: Instagram breastfeeding bikini photo reveals ‘perks’ | The Advertiser

title: Blake Lively: Instagram breastfeeding bikini photo reveals ‘perks’ | The
text:
BLAKE Lively has got the breast gig in the world.
The 27-year-old actor, who welcomed daughter James Reynolds with husband Ryan Reynolds, 38, last December, shared a photo of her cleavage on Instagram.
“The PERKS of breastfeeding,” Lively captioned the image, adding the hashtags, “YesThatsRiceInMyHair,” “#BlondevsBronde,” and “BrondeJamesBronde.”
While Lively has joked about breastfeeding in the past, the “Age of Adeline” beauty has adjusted to motherhood quite well and has found the balance to “have it all.”
“The PERKS of breastfeeding' (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/5MK7kJR4P0/embed .)
“Most of the things I do are all-consuming, but somehow I find a way to do it all,” the Preserve editor dished to Allure magazine earlier this year.
“But it’s dangerous to dilute that to such a catchphrase. Having it all could be having a happy, healthy family, and you could be a mum who stays at home, and that is the most admirable thing you could do. Or it could be having a profession that you really believe in, and not having a family, and doing what fulfils you.”
This article first appeared in the New York Post .
Originally published as Blake Lively shows off the ‘perks of breastfeeding’
